price: (21) And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.[1530]
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ
footnotes: [1530]- i.e., one angel driving the soul to the Judgement and one to testify as to its deeds.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wajāat kullu nafsin maʿahā sāiqun washahīdun
